info.description: Retrieves currency pair position information for the legal entity
info.title: Holdings Treasury Currency Pairs APIs

parameters.name: currencyPair
parameters.description: Derived by the system based on the base and quote currency

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency positions.

parameters.name: buyDate
parameters.description: Value date of the buy currency.

parameters.name: dealDate
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: counterpartyName
parameters.description: The counterparty name for the forex deal.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: rateSource
parameters.description: The market rates source in general. In the case of currency rate, whether rate is to be sourced from  currency table (front office) or from market rates table (back office).

parameters.name: rateProvider
parameters.description: "The market rate provider, e.g. Bloomberg, Reuters, etc. "

parameters.name: assetType
parameters.description: Type of the asset, e.g. FX, equity, etc.

parameters.name: dateOrPeriod
parameters.description: Refers to a date or a given period.

parameters.name: rateIndicator
parameters.description: "Market rate indicator as per the asset class. For currency, it  will be buy rate(B) , sell rate(S) or mid rate(M).  "

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

currencyPair.description: Derived by the system based on the base and quote currency

currecy1Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency one.

currency2Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency two.

revaluationRate.description: The rate used to revalue the currency positions.

profitAndLossInCurrency2.description: Currency (other than local currency) in which profit and loss is expressed.

profitAndLossInLocalCurrency.description: The local currency in which profit and loss is expressed.

profitAndLossInRevaluationCurrency.description: Currency (other than local currency) in which profit and loss is expressed.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

calendarPeriod.description: The calendar period used for consolidating the data into different time buckets.

currecy1Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency one.

currency2Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency two.

revaluationRate.description: The rate used to revalue the currency positions.

profitLossCurrency2.description: Currency (other than local currency) in which profit and loss is expressed.

profitLossLocalCurrency.description: The local currency in which profit and loss is expressed.

profitLossInRevaluationCurrency.description: Currency (other than local currency) in which profit and loss is expressed.

rateSource.description: The market rates source in general. In the case of currency rate, whether rate is to be sourced from  currency table (front office) or from market rates table (back office).

rateProvider.description: "The market rate provider, e.g. Bloomberg, Reuters, etc. "

currencyOrPair.description: A single currency or a currency pair.

assetType.description: Type of the asset, e.g. FX, equity, etc.

dateOrPeriod.description: Refers to a date or a given period.

rateIndicator.description: "Market rate indicator as per the asset class. For currency, it  will be buy rate(B) , sell rate(S) or mid rate(M).  "

interpolationMarker.description: The method used for interpolation to derive currency forward rates.

dealType.description: Foreign Exchange deal type. Allowed values: - SP(spot) - FW(forward) - SW(Swap)

counterparty.description: The counterparty ID  for the  deal.

currecy1Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency one.

currency2Amount.description: In the transaction, there may be two currencies involved. Amount of the currency two.

valueDate.description: Shows the date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes).

dealer.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency position

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

currencyPair.description: Derived by the system based on the base and quote currency
